"Sets all the properties of an element's left border"|border-left|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left|<br>As with all shorthand properties, border-left always sets the values of all of the properties that it can set, even if they are not specified It sets those that are not specified to their default values Consider the following code:<br>border-left-style: dotted;<br>border-left: thick green;<br>It is actually the same as this one:<br>border-left-style: dotted;<br>border-left: none thick green;<br>The value of border-left-style given before border-left is ignored Since the default value of border-left-style is none, not specifying the border-style part results in no border|<table class=""properties""><tbody><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/initial_value"">Initial value</a></th><td>as each of the properties of the shorthand:<br/><ul><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-width""><code>border-left-width</code></a>: <code>medium</code></li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-style""><code>border-left-style</code></a>: <code>none</code></li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-color""><code>border-left-color</code></a>: <code>currentcolor</code></li></ul></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Applies to</th><td>all elements. It also applies to <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/::first-letter""><code>::first-letter</code></a>.</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/inheritance"">Inherited</a></th><td>no</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/computed_value"">Computed value</a></th><td>as each of the properties of the shorthand:<br/><ul><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-width""><code>border-left-width</code></a>: the absolute length or <code>0</code> if <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-style""><code>border-left-style</code></a> is <code>none</code> or <code>hidden</code></li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-style""><code>border-left-style</code></a>: as specified</li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-color""><code>border-left-color</code></a>: computed color</li></ul></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Animation type</th><td>as each of the properties of the shorthand:<br/><ul><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-color""><code>border-left-color</code></a>: a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/color_value#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;color&gt; CSS data type are interpolated on each of their red, green, blue components, each handled as a real, floating-point number. Note that interpolation of colors happens in the alpha-premultiplied sRGBA color space to prevent unexpected grey colors to appear."">color</a></li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-style""><code>border-left-style</code></a>: discrete</li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-width""><code>border-left-width</code></a>: a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;length&gt; CSS data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers."">length</a></li></ul></td></tr></tbody></table>|<pre><br>border-left: 1px;<br>border-left: 2px dotted;<br>border-left: medium dashed blue;<br><br>/* Global values */<br>border-left: inherit;<br>border-left: initial;<br>border-left: revert;<br>border-left: revert-layer;<br>border-left: unset;<br><br></pre><br><br><p>The three values of the shorthand property can be specified in any order, and one or two of them may be omitted.</p>|<ul><br><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border""><code>border</code></a></li><br><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-block""><code>border-block</code></a></li><br><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/outline""><code>outline</code></a></li><br><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/CSS_Backgrounds_and_Borders"">Backgrounds and borders</a></li><br><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/CSS/Building_blocks/Backgrounds_and_borders"">Learn CSS: Backgrounds and borders</a></li><br></ul>|css-backgrounds
"Sets the color of an element's left border"|border-left-color|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-color| It can also be set with the shorthand CSS properties border-color or border-left|<table class=""properties""><tbody><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/initial_value"">Initial value</a></th><td><code>currentcolor</code></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Applies to</th><td>all elements. It also applies to <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/::first-letter""><code>::first-letter</code></a>.</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/inheritance"">Inherited</a></th><td>no</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/computed_value"">Computed value</a></th><td>computed color</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Animation type</th><td>a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/color_value#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;color&gt; CSS data type are interpolated on each of their red, green, blue components, each handled as a real, floating-point number. Note that interpolation of colors happens in the alpha-premultiplied sRGBA color space to prevent unexpected grey colors to appear."">color</a></td></tr></tbody></table>|<pre><br>/* <color> values */<br>border-left-color: red;<br>border-left-color: #ffbb00;<br>border-left-color: rgb(255, 0, 0);<br>border-left-color: hsla(100%, 50%, 25%, 0.75);<br>border-left-color: currentcolor;<br>border-left-color: transparent;<br><br>/* Global values */<br>border-left-color: inherit;<br>border-left-color: initial;<br>border-left-color: revert;<br>border-left-color: revert-layer;<br>border-left-color: unset;<br><br></pre><br><br><p>The <code>border-left-color</code> property is specified as a single value.</p>|<ul><br><li>The border-related CSS shorthand properties: <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border""><code>border</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left""><code>border-left</code></a>, and <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-color""><code>border-color</code></a>.</li><br><li>The color-related CSS properties for the other borders: <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-color""><code>border-right-color</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-bottom-color""><code>border-bottom-color</code></a>, and <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-color""><code>border-top-color</code></a>.</li><br><li>The other border-related CSS properties applying to the same border: <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-style""><code>border-left-style</code></a> and <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-width""><code>border-left-width</code></a>.</li><br></ul>|css-backgrounds
"Sets the line style of an element's left border"|border-left-style|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-style|<br>Note: The specification doesn't define how borders of different styles connect in the corners|<table class=""properties""><tbody><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/initial_value"">Initial value</a></th><td><code>none</code></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Applies to</th><td>all elements. It also applies to <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/::first-letter""><code>::first-letter</code></a>.</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/inheritance"">Inherited</a></th><td>no</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/computed_value"">Computed value</a></th><td>as specified</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Animation type</th><td>discrete</td></tr></tbody></table>|<pre><br>/* Keyword values */<br>border-left-style: none;<br>border-left-style: hidden;<br>border-left-style: dotted;<br>border-left-style: dashed;<br>border-left-style: solid;<br>border-left-style: double;<br>border-left-style: groove;<br>border-left-style: ridge;<br>border-left-style: inset;<br>border-left-style: outset;<br><br>/* Global values */<br>border-left-style: inherit;<br>border-left-style: initial;<br>border-left-style: revert;<br>border-left-style: revert-layer;<br>border-left-style: unset;<br><br></pre><br><br><p>The <code>border-left-style</code> property is specified as a single keyword chosen from those available for the <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-style""><code>border-style</code></a> property.</p>|<ul><br><li>The other style-related border properties: <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-bottom-style""><code>border-bottom-style</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-style""><code>border-right-style</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-style""><code>border-top-style</code></a>, and <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-style""><code>border-style</code></a>.</li><br><li>The other left-border-related properties: <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left""><code>border-left</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-color""><code>border-left-color</code></a>, and <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-width""><code>border-left-width</code></a>.</li><br></ul>|css-backgrounds
"Sets the width of the left border of an element"|border-left-width|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-width||<table class=""properties""><tbody><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/initial_value"">Initial value</a></th><td><code>medium</code></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Applies to</th><td>all elements. It also applies to <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/::first-letter""><code>::first-letter</code></a>.</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/inheritance"">Inherited</a></th><td>no</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/computed_value"">Computed value</a></th><td>the absolute length or <code>0</code> if <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-style""><code>border-left-style</code></a> is <code>none</code> or <code>hidden</code></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Animation type</th><td>a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;length&gt; CSS data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers."">length</a></td></tr></tbody></table>|<pre><br>/* Keyword values */<br>border-left-width: thin;<br>border-left-width: medium;<br>border-left-width: thick;<br><br>/* <length> values */<br>border-left-width: 10em;<br>border-left-width: 3vmax;<br>border-left-width: 6px;<br><br>/* Global keywords */<br>border-left-width: inherit;<br>border-left-width: initial;<br>border-left-width: revert;<br>border-left-width: revert-layer;<br>border-left-width: unset;<br><br></pre><br>|<ul><br><li>The other border-width-related CSS properties: <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-width""><code>border-top-width</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-width""><code>border-right-width</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-bottom-width""><code>border-bottom-width</code></a>, and <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-width""><code>border-width</code></a>.</li><br><li>The other border-left-related CSS properties: <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border""><code>border</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left""><code>border-left</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-style""><code>border-left-style</code></a>, and <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-color""><code>border-left-color</code></a>.</li><br></ul>|css-backgrounds
"Rounds the corners of an element's outer border edge"|border-radius|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-radius| You can set a single radius to make circular corners, or two radii to make elliptical corners<br>The radius applies to the whole background, even if the element has no border; the exact position of the clipping is defined by the background-clip property<br>The border-radius property does not apply to table elements when border-collapse is collapse<br>Note: As with any shorthand property, individual sub-properties cannot inherit, such as in border-radius:0 0 inherit inherit, which would partially override existing definitions Instead, the individual longhand properties have to be used|<table class=""properties""><tbody><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/initial_value"">Initial value</a></th><td>as each of the properties of the shorthand:<br/><ul><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-left-radius""><code>border-top-left-radius</code></a>: <code>0</code></li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-right-radius""><code>border-top-right-radius</code></a>: <code>0</code></li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-bottom-right-radius""><code>border-bottom-right-radius</code></a>: <code>0</code></li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-bottom-left-radius""><code>border-bottom-left-radius</code></a>: <code>0</code></li></ul></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Applies to</th><td>all elements; but User Agents are not required to apply to <code>table</code> and <code>inline-table</code> elements when <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-collapse""><code>border-collapse</code></a> is <code>collapse</code>. The behavior on internal table elements is undefined for the moment.. It also applies to <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/::first-letter""><code>::first-letter</code></a>.</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/inheritance"">Inherited</a></th><td>no</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Percentages</th><td>refer to the corresponding dimension of the border box</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/computed_value"">Computed value</a></th><td>as each of the properties of the shorthand:<br/><ul><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-bottom-left-radius""><code>border-bottom-left-radius</code></a>: two absolute <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length""><code>&lt;length&gt;</code></a>s or <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/percentage""><code>&lt;percentage&gt;</code></a>s</li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-bottom-right-radius""><code>border-bottom-right-radius</code></a>: two absolute <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length""><code>&lt;length&gt;</code></a>s or <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/percentage""><code>&lt;percentage&gt;</code></a>s</li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-left-radius""><code>border-top-left-radius</code></a>: two absolute <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length""><code>&lt;length&gt;</code></a>s or <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/percentage""><code>&lt;percentage&gt;</code></a>s</li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-right-radius""><code>border-top-right-radius</code></a>: two absolute <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length""><code>&lt;length&gt;</code></a>s or <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/percentage""><code>&lt;percentage&gt;</code></a>s</li></ul></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Animation type</th><td>as each of the properties of the shorthand:<br/><ul><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-left-radius""><code>border-top-left-radius</code></a>: a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;length&gt; CSS data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers."">length</a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/percentage#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;percentage&gt; CSS data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers."">percentage</a> or calc();</li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-right-radius""><code>border-top-right-radius</code></a>: a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;length&gt; CSS data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers."">length</a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/percentage#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;percentage&gt; CSS data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers."">percentage</a> or calc();</li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-bottom-right-radius""><code>border-bottom-right-radius</code></a>: a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;length&gt; CSS data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers."">length</a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/percentage#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;percentage&gt; CSS data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers."">percentage</a> or calc();</li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-bottom-left-radius""><code>border-bottom-left-radius</code></a>: a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;length&gt; CSS data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers."">length</a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/percentage#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;percentage&gt; CSS data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers."">percentage</a> or calc();</li></ul></td></tr></tbody></table>|<pre><br>/* The syntax of the first radius allows one to four values */<br>/* Radius is set for all 4 sides */<br>border-radius: 10px;<br><br>/* top-left-and-bottom-right | top-right-and-bottom-left */<br>border-radius: 10px 5%;<br><br>/* top-left | top-right-and-bottom-left | bottom-right */<br>border-radius: 2px 4px 2px;<br><br>/* top-left | top-right | bottom-right | bottom-left */<br>border-radius: 1px 0 3px 4px;<br><br>/* The syntax of the second radius allows one to four values */<br>/* (first radius values) / radius */<br>border-radius: 10px / 20px;<br><br>/* (first radius values) / top-left-and-bottom-right | top-right-and-bottom-left */<br>border-radius: 10px 5% / 20px 30px;<br><br>/* (first radius values) / top-left | top-right-and-bottom-left | bottom-right */<br>border-radius: 10px 5px 2em / 20px 25px 30%;<br><br>/* (first radius values) / top-left | top-right | bottom-right | bottom-left */<br>border-radius: 10px 5% / 20px 25em 30px 35em;<br><br>/* Global values */<br>border-radius: inherit;<br>border-radius: initial;<br>border-radius: revert;<br>border-radius: revert-layer;<br>border-radius: unset;<br><br></pre><br><br><p>The <code>border-radius</code> property is specified as:</p><br><ul><br><li>one, two, three, or four <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length""><code>&lt;length&gt;</code></a> or <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/percentage""><code>&lt;percentage&gt;</code></a> values. This is used to set a single radius for the corners.</li><br><li>followed optionally by ""/"" and one, two, three, or four <code>&lt;length&gt;</code> or <code>&lt;percentage&gt;</code> values. This is used to set an additional radius, so you can have elliptical corners.</li><br></ul>|<ul><br><li>Border-radius-related CSS properties: <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-left-radius""><code>border-top-left-radius</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-right-radius""><code>border-top-right-radius</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-bottom-right-radius""><code>border-bottom-right-radius</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-bottom-left-radius""><code>border-bottom-left-radius</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-start-start-radius""><code>border-start-start-radius</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-start-end-radius""><code>border-start-end-radius</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-end-start-radius""><code>border-end-start-radius</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-end-end-radius""><code>border-end-end-radius</code></a></li><br></ul>|css-backgrounds
"Sets all the properties of an element's right border"|border-right|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right|<br>As with all shorthand properties, border-right always sets the values of all of the properties that it can set, even if they are not specified It sets those that are not specified to their default values Consider the following code:<br>border-right-style: dotted;<br>border-right: thick green;<br>It is actually the same as this one:<br>border-right-style: dotted;<br>border-right: none thick green;<br>The value of border-right-style given before border-right is ignored Since the default value of border-right-style is none, not specifying the border-style part results in no border|<table class=""properties""><tbody><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/initial_value"">Initial value</a></th><td>as each of the properties of the shorthand:<br/><ul><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-width""><code>border-right-width</code></a>: <code>medium</code></li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-style""><code>border-right-style</code></a>: <code>none</code></li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-color""><code>border-right-color</code></a>: <code>currentcolor</code></li></ul></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Applies to</th><td>all elements. It also applies to <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/::first-letter""><code>::first-letter</code></a>.</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/inheritance"">Inherited</a></th><td>no</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/computed_value"">Computed value</a></th><td>as each of the properties of the shorthand:<br/><ul><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-width""><code>border-right-width</code></a>: the absolute length or <code>0</code> if <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-style""><code>border-right-style</code></a> is <code>none</code> or <code>hidden</code></li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-style""><code>border-right-style</code></a>: as specified</li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-color""><code>border-right-color</code></a>: computed color</li></ul></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Animation type</th><td>as each of the properties of the shorthand:<br/><ul><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-color""><code>border-right-color</code></a>: a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/color_value#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;color&gt; CSS data type are interpolated on each of their red, green, blue components, each handled as a real, floating-point number. Note that interpolation of colors happens in the alpha-premultiplied sRGBA color space to prevent unexpected grey colors to appear."">color</a></li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-style""><code>border-right-style</code></a>: discrete</li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-width""><code>border-right-width</code></a>: a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;length&gt; CSS data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers."">length</a></li></ul></td></tr></tbody></table>|<pre><br>border-right: 1px;<br>border-right: 2px dotted;<br>border-right: medium dashed green;<br><br>/* Global values */<br>border-right: inherit;<br>border-right: initial;<br>border-right: revert;<br>border-right: revert-layer;<br>border-right: unset;<br><br></pre><br><br><p>The three values of the shorthand property can be specified in any order, and one or two of them may be omitted.</p>|<ul><br><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border""><code>border</code></a></li><br><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-block""><code>border-block</code></a></li><br><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/outline""><code>outline</code></a></li><br></ul>|css-backgrounds
"Sets the color of an element's right border"|border-right-color|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-color| It can also be set with the shorthand CSS properties border-color or border-right|<table class=""properties""><tbody><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/initial_value"">Initial value</a></th><td><code>currentcolor</code></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Applies to</th><td>all elements. "Sets the line style of an element's right border"|border-right-style|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-style|<br>Note: The specification doesn't define how borders of different styles connect in the corners|<table class=""properties""><tbody><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/initial_value"">Initial value</a></th><td><code>none</code></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Applies to</th><td>all elements. type</th><td>discrete</td></tr></tbody></table>|<pre><br>/* Keyword values */<br>border-right-style: none;<br>border-right-style: hidden;<br>border-right-style: dotted;<br>border-right-style: dashed;<br>border-right-style: solid;<br>border-right-style: double;<br>border-right-style: groove;<br>border-right-style: ridge;<br>border-right-style: inset;<br>border-right-style: outset;<br><br>/* unset;<br><br></pre><br><br><p>The <code>border-right-style</code> property is specified as a single keyword chosen from those available for the <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-style""><code>border-style</code></a> property.</p>|<ul><br><li>The other style-related border properties: <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-width""><code>border-right-width</code></a>.</li><br></ul>|css-backgrounds
"Sets the width of the right border of an element"|border-right-width|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-width||<table class=""properties""><tbody><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/initial_value"">Initial value</a></th><td><code>medium</code></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Applies to</th><td>all elements. It also applies to <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/::first-letter""><code>::first-letter</code></a>.</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/inheritance"">Inherited</a></th><td>no</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/computed_value"">Computed value</a></th><td>the absolute length or <code>0</code> if <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-style""><code>border-right-style</code></a> is <code>none</code> or <code>hidden</code></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Animation type</th><td>a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;length&gt; CSS data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers."">length</a></td></tr></tbody></table>|<pre><br>/* Keyword values */<br>border-right-width: thin;<br>border-right-width: medium;<br>border-right-width: thick;<br><br>/* <length> values */<br>border-right-width: 10em;<br>border-right-width: 3vmax;<br>border-right-width: 6px;<br><br>/* Global keywords */<br>border-right-width: inherit;<br>border-right-width: initial;<br>border-right-width: revert;<br>border-right-width: revert-layer;<br>border-right-width: unset;<br><br></pre><br>|<ul><br><li>The other border-width-related CSS properties: <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-bottom-width""><code>border-bottom-width</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-width""><code>border-left-width</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-width""><code>border-top-width</code></a>, and <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-width""><code>border-width</code></a>.</li><br><li>The other border-right-related CSS properties: <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border""><code>border</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right""><code>border-right</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-style""><code>border-right-style</code></a>, and <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-color""><code>border-right-color</code></a>.</li><br></ul>|css-backgrounds
"Sets the distance between the borders of adjacent cells in a <table>"|border-spacing|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-spacing| This property applies only when border-collapse is separate<br>The border-spacing value is also used along the outside edge of the table, where the distance between the table's border and the cells in the first/last column or row is the sum of the relevant (horizontal or vertical) border-spacing and the relevant (top, right, bottom, or left) padding on the table<br>Note: The border-spacing property is equivalent to the deprecated cellspacing <table> attribute, except that it has an optional second value that can be used to set different horizontal and vertical spacing|<table class=""properties""><tbody><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/initial_value"">Initial value</a></th><td><code>0</code></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Applies to</th><td><code>table</code> and <code>inline-table</code> elements</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/inheritance"">Inherited</a></th><td>yes</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/computed_value"">Computed value</a></th><td>two absolute lengths</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Animation type</th><td>discrete</td></tr></tbody></table>|<pre><br>/* <length> */<br>border-spacing: 2px;<br><br>/* horizontal <length> | vertical <length> */<br>border-spacing: 1cm 2em;<br><br>/* Global values */<br>border-spacing: inherit;<br>border-spacing: initial;<br>border-spacing: revert;<br>border-spacing: revert-layer;<br>border-spacing: unset;<br><br></pre><br><br><p>The <code>border-spacing</code> property may be specified as either one or two values.</p><br><ul><br><li>When <strong>one</strong> <code>&lt;length&gt;</code> value is specified, it defines both the horizontal and vertical spacings between cells.</li><br><li>When <strong>two</strong> <code>&lt;length&gt;</code> values are specified, the first value defines the horizontal spacing between cells (i.e., the space between cells in adjacent <em>columns</em>), and the second value defines the vertical spacing between cells (i.e., the space between cells in adjacent <em>rows</em>).</li><br></ul>|<ul><br><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-collapse""><code>border-collapse</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-style""><code>border-style</code></a></li><br><li>The <code>border-spacing</code> property alters the appearance of the <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/table""><code>&lt;table&gt;</code></a> HTML element.</li><br></ul>|css2
"Defines a logical border radius on an element, which maps to a physical border radius depending on the element's writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation"|border-start-end-radius|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-start-end-radius| This is useful when building styles to work regardless of the text orientation and writing mode<br>This property affects the corner between the block-start and the inline-end sides of the element For instance, in a horizontal-tb writing mode with ltr direction, it corresponds to the border-top-right-radius property|<table class=""properties""><tbody><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/initial_value"">Initial value</a></th><td><code>0</code></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Applies to</th><td>all elements; but User Agents are not required to apply to <code>table</code> and <code>inline-table</code> elements when <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-collapse""><code>border-collapse</code></a> is <code>collapse</code>. The behavior on internal table elements is undefined for the moment.. It also applies to <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/::first-letter""><code>::first-letter</code></a>.</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/inheritance"">Inherited</a></th><td>no</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Percentages</th><td>refer to the corresponding dimension of the border box</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/computed_value"">Computed value</a></th><td>two absolute <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length""><code>&lt;length&gt;</code></a>s or <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/percentage""><code>&lt;percentage&gt;</code></a>s</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Animation type</th><td>a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;length&gt; CSS data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers."">length</a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/percentage#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;percentage&gt; CSS data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers."">percentage</a> or calc();</td></tr></tbody></table>|<pre><br>/* <length> values */<br>/* With one value the corner will be a circle */<br>border-start-end-radius: 10px;<br>border-start-end-radius: 1em;<br><br>/* With two values the corner will be an ellipse */<br>border-start-end-radius: 1em 2em;<br><br>/* Global values */<br>border-start-end-radius: inherit;<br>border-start-end-radius: initial;<br>border-start-end-radius: revert;<br>border-start-end-radius: revert-layer;<br>border-start-end-radius: unset;<br><br></pre><br>|<ul><br><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/CSS_Logical_Properties"">CSS Logical Properties and Values</a></li><br><li>The mapped physical property: <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-bottom-left-radius""><code>border-bottom-left-radius</code></a></li><br><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/writing-mode""><code>writing-mode</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/direction""><code>direction</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/text-orientation""><code>text-orientation</code></a></li><br></ul>|css-logical

"Sets the line style for all four sides of an element's border"|border-style|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-style||<table class=""properties""><tbody><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/initial_value"">Initial value</a></th><td>as each of the properties of the shorthand:<br/><ul><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-style""><code>border-top-style</code></a>: <code>none</code></li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-style""><code>border-right-style</code></a>: <code>none</code></li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-bottom-style""><code>border-bottom-style</code></a>: <code>none</code></li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-style""><code>border-left-style</code></a>: <code>none</code></li></ul></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Applies to</th><td>all elements. It also applies to <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/::first-letter""><code>::first-letter</code></a>.</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/inheritance"">Inherited</a></th><td>no</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/computed_value"">Computed value</a></th><td>as each of the properties of the shorthand:<br/><ul><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-bottom-style""><code>border-bottom-style</code></a>: as specified</li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-style""><code>border-left-style</code></a>: as specified</li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-style""><code>border-right-style</code></a>: as specified</li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-style""><code>border-top-style</code></a>: as specified</li></ul></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Animation type</th><td>discrete</td></tr></tbody></table>|<pre><br>/* Keyword values */<br>border-style: none;<br>border-style: hidden;<br>border-style: dotted;<br>border-style: dashed;<br>border-style: solid;<br>border-style: double;<br>border-style: groove;<br>border-style: ridge;<br>border-style: inset;<br>border-style: outset;<br><br>/* top and bottom | left and right */<br>border-style: dotted solid;<br><br>/* top | left and right | bottom */<br>border-style: hidden double dashed;<br><br>/* top | right | bottom | left */<br>border-style: none solid dotted dashed;<br><br>/* Global values */<br>border-style: inherit;<br>border-style: initial;<br>border-style: revert;<br>border-style: revert-layer;<br>border-style: unset;<br><br></pre><br><br><p>The <code>border-style</code> property may be specified using one, two, three, or four values.</p><br><ul><br><li>When <strong>one</strong> value is specified, it applies the same style to <strong>all four sides</strong>.</li><br><li>When <strong>two</strong> values are specified, the first style applies to the <strong>top and bottom</strong>, the second to the <strong>left and right</strong>.</li><br><li>When <strong>three</strong> values are specified, the first style applies to the <strong>top</strong>, the second to the <strong>left and right</strong>, the third to the <strong>bottom</strong>.</li><br><li>When <strong>four</strong> values are specified, the styles apply to the <strong>top</strong>, <strong>right</strong>, <strong>bottom</strong>, and <strong>left</strong> in that order (clockwise).</li><br></ul><br><p>Each value is a keyword chosen from the list below.</p>|<ul><br><li>The border-related shorthand CSS properties: <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border""><code>border</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-width""><code>border-width</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-color""><code>border-color</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-radius""><code>border-radius</code></a></li><br></ul>|css-backgrounds
"Sets all the properties of an element's top border"|border-top|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top|<br>As with all shorthand properties, border-top always sets the values of all of the properties that it can set, even if they are not specified It sets those that are not specified to their default values Consider the following code:<br>border-top-style: dotted;<br>border-top: thick green;<br>It is actually the same as this one:<br>border-top-style: dotted;<br>border-top: none thick green;<br>The value of border-top-style given before border-top is ignored Since the default value of border-top-style is none, not specifying the border-style part results in no border|<table class=""properties""><tbody><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/initial_value"">Initial value</a></th><td>as each of the properties of the shorthand:<br/><ul><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-width""><code>border-top-width</code></a>: <code>medium</code></li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-style""><code>border-top-style</code></a>: <code>none</code></li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-color""><code>border-top-color</code></a>: <code>currentcolor</code></li></ul></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Applies to</th><td>all elements. It also applies to <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/::first-letter""><code>::first-letter</code></a>.</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/inheritance"">Inherited</a></th><td>no</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/computed_value"">Computed value</a></th><td>as each of the properties of the shorthand:<br/><ul><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-width""><code>border-top-width</code></a>: the absolute length or <code>0</code> if <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-style""><code>border-top-style</code></a> is <code>none</code> or <code>hidden</code></li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-style""><code>border-top-style</code></a>: as specified</li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-color""><code>border-top-color</code></a>: computed color</li></ul></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Animation type</th><td>as each of the properties of the shorthand:<br/><ul><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-color""><code>border-top-color</code></a>: a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/color_value#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;color&gt; CSS data type are interpolated on each of their red, green, blue components, each handled as a real, floating-point number. Note that interpolation of colors happens in the alpha-premultiplied sRGBA color space to prevent unexpected grey colors to appear."">color</a></li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-style""><code>border-top-style</code></a>: discrete</li><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-width""><code>border-top-width</code></a>: a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;length&gt; CSS data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers."">length</a></li></ul></td></tr></tbody></table>|<pre><br>border-top: 1px;<br>border-top: 2px dotted;<br>border-top: medium dashed green;<br><br>/* Global values */<br>border-top: inherit;<br>border-top: initial;<br>border-top: revert;<br>border-top: revert-layer;<br>border-top: unset;<br><br></pre><br><br><p>The three values of the shorthand property can be specified in any order, and one or two of them may be omitted.</p>|<ul><br><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border""><code>border</code></a></li><br><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-block""><code>border-block</code></a></li><br><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/outline""><code>outline</code></a></li><br></ul>|css-backgrounds
"Sets the color of an element's top border"|border-top-color|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-color| It can also be set with the shorthand CSS properties border-color or border-top|<table class=""properties""><tbody><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/initial_value"">Initial value</a></th><td><code>currentcolor</code></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Applies to</th><td>all elements. It also applies to <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/::first-letter""><code>::first-letter</code></a>.</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/inheritance"">Inherited</a></th><td>no</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/computed_value"">Computed value</a></th><td>computed color</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Animation type</th><td>a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/color_value#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;color&gt; CSS data type are interpolated on each of their red, green, blue components, each handled as a real, floating-point number. Note that interpolation of colors happens in the alpha-premultiplied sRGBA color space to prevent unexpected grey colors to appear."">color</a></td></tr></tbody></table>|<pre><br>/* <color> values */<br>border-top-color: red;<br>border-top-color: #ffbb00;<br>border-top-color: rgb(255, 0, 0);<br>border-top-color: hsla(100%, 50%, 25%, 0.75);<br>border-top-color: currentcolor;<br>border-top-color: transparent;<br><br>/* Global values */<br>border-top-color: inherit;<br>border-top-color: initial;<br>border-top-color: revert;<br>border-top-color: revert-layer;<br>border-top-color: unset;<br><br></pre><br><br><p>The <code>border-top-color</code> property is specified as a single value.</p>|<ul><br><li>The border-related CSS shorthand properties: <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border""><code>border</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top""><code>border-top</code></a>, and <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-color""><code>border-color</code></a>.</li><br><li>The color-related CSS properties for the other borders: <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-right-color""><code>border-right-color</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-bottom-color""><code>border-bottom-color</code></a>, and <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-left-color""><code>border-left-color</code></a>.</li><br><li>The other border-related CSS properties applying to the same border: <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-style""><code>border-top-style</code></a> and <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-width""><code>border-top-width</code></a>.</li><br></ul>|css-backgrounds
"Rounds the top-left corner of an element by specifying the radius (or the radius of the semi-major and semi-minor axes) of the ellipse defining the curvature of the corner"|border-top-left-radius|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-left-radius|<br>The rounding can be a circle or an ellipse, or if one of the value is 0, no rounding is done and the corner is square<br><br>A background, being an image or a color, is clipped at the border, even a rounded one; the exact location of the clipping is defined by the value of the background-clip property<br>Note: If the value of this property is not set in a border-radius shorthand property that is applied to the element after the border-top-left-radius CSS property, the value of this property is then reset to its initial value by the shorthand property|<table class=""properties""><tbody><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/initial_value"">Initial value</a></th><td><code>0</code></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Applies to</th><td>all elements; but User Agents are not required to apply to <code>table</code> and <code>inline-table</code> elements when <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-collapse""><code>border-collapse</code></a> is <code>collapse</code>. The behavior on internal table elements is undefined for the moment.. It also applies to <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/::first-letter""><code>::first-letter</code></a>.</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/inheritance"">Inherited</a></th><td>no</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Percentages</th><td>refer to the corresponding dimension of the border box</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/computed_value"">Computed value</a></th><td>two absolute <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length""><code>&lt;length&gt;</code></a>s or <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/percentage""><code>&lt;percentage&gt;</code></a>s</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Animation type</th><td>a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;length&gt; CSS data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers."">length</a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/percentage#interpolation"" title=""Values of the &lt;percentage&gt; CSS data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers."">percentage</a> or calc();</td></tr></tbody></table>|<pre><br>/* the corner is a circle */<br>/* border-top-left-radius: radius */<br>border-top-left-radius: 3px;<br><br>/* the corner is an ellipse */<br>/* border-top-left-radius: horizontal vertical */<br>border-top-left-radius: 0.5em 1em;<br><br>border-top-left-radius: inherit;<br><br>/* Global values */<br>border-top-left-radius: inherit;<br>border-top-left-radius: initial;<br>border-top-left-radius: revert;<br>border-top-left-radius: revert-layer;<br>border-top-left-radius: unset;<br><br></pre><br><br><p>With one value:</p><br><ul><br><li>the value is a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length""><code>&lt;length&gt;</code></a> or a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/percentage""><code>&lt;percentage&gt;</code></a> denoting the radius of the circle to use for the border in that corner.</li><br></ul><br><p>With two values:</p><br><ul><br><li>the first value is a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length""><code>&lt;length&gt;</code></a> or a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/percentage""><code>&lt;percentage&gt;</code></a> denoting the horizontal semi-major axis of the ellipse to use for the border in that corner.</li><br><li>the second value is a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length""><code>&lt;length&gt;</code></a> or a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/percentage""><code>&lt;percentage&gt;</code></a> denoting the vertical semi-major axis of the ellipse to use for the border in that corner.</li><br></ul>|<ul><br><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-radius""><code>border-radius</code></a> shorthand property</li><br><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-right-radius""><code>border-top-right-radius</code></a>, <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-bottom-right-radius""><code>border-bottom-right-radius</code></a>, and <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-bottom-left-radius""><code>border-bottom-left-radius</code></a></li><br></ul>|css-backgrounds
"Rounds the top-right corner of an element by specifying the radius (or the radius of the semi-major and semi-minor axes) of the ellipse defining the curvature of the corner"|border-top-right-radius|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-right-radius|<br>The rounding can be a circle or an ellipse, or if one of the value is 0 no rounding is done and the corner is square<br><br>A background, being an image or a color, is clipped at the border, even a rounded one; the exact location of the clipping is defined by the value of the background-clip property<br>Note: If the value of this property is not set in a border-radius shorthand property that is applied to the element after the border-top-right-radius CSS property, the value of this property is then reset to its initial value by the shorthand property|<table class=""properties""><tbody><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/initial_value"">Initial value</a></th><td><code>0</code></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Applies to</th><td>all elements; but User Agents are not required to apply to <code>table</code> and <code>inline-table</code> elements when <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-collapse""><code>border-collapse</code></a> is <code>collapse</code>. box</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/computed_value"">Computed value</a></th><td>two absolute <a numbers."">percentage</a> or calc();</td></tr></tbody></table>|<pre><br>/* the corner is a circle */<br>/* border-top-right-radius: radius */<br>border-top-right-radius: 3px;<br><br>/* the corner is an ellipse */<br>/* border-top-right-radius: horizontal vertical */<br>border-top-right-radius: 0.5em 1em;<br><br>border-top-right-radius: inherit;<br><br>/* Global values */<br>border-top-right-radius: inherit;<br>border-top-right-radius: initial;<br>border-top-right-radius: revert;<br>border-top-right-radius: revert-layer;<br>border-top-right-radius: unset;<br><br></pre><br><br><p>With one value:</p><br><ul><br><li>the value is a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length""><code>&lt;length&gt;</code></a> or a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/percentage""><code>&lt;percentage&gt;</code></a> denoting the radius of the circle to use for the border in that corner.</li><br></ul><br><p>With two values:</p><br><ul><br><li>the first value is a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/length""><code>&lt;length&gt;</code></a> or a <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/percentage""><code>&lt;percentage&gt;</code></a> denoting the horizontal semi-major axis of the ellipse to use for the border in that corner.</li><br></ul>|<ul><br><li><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-radius""><code>border-radius</code></a> shorthand property</li><br><li><a "Sets the line style of an element's top border"|border-top-style|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-style|<br>Note: The specification doesn't define how borders of different styles connect in the corners|<table class=""properties""><tbody><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/initial_value"">Initial value</a></th><td><code>none</code></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Applies to</th><td>all elements. It also applies to <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/::first-letter""><code>::first-letter</code></a>.</td></tr><tr><th scope=""row""><a type</th><td>discrete</td></tr></tbody></table>|<pre><br>/* Keyword values */<br>border-top-style: none;<br>border-top-style: hidden;<br>border-top-style: dotted;<br>border-top-style: values */<br>border-top-style: inherit;<br>border-top-style: initial;<br>border-top-style: revert;<br>border-top-style: revert-layer;<br>border-top-style: unset;<br><br></pre><br><br><p>The <code>border-top-style</code> property is specified as a single keyword chosen from those available for the <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-style""><code>border-style</code></a> property.</p>|<ul><br><li>The other style-related border properties: <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-bottom-style""><code>border-bottom-style</code></a>, and <a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-style""><code>border-style</code></a>.</li><br><li>The other top-border-related properties: <a "Sets the width of the top border of an element"|border-top-width|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/border-top-width||<table class=""properties""><tbody><tr><th scope=""row""><a href=""https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/initial_value"">Initial value</a></th><td><code>medium</code></td></tr><tr><th scope=""row"">Applies to</th><td>all elements.
